title: Trump Targets Corporate Homebuying In Affordable Housing Push
description: President Trump pledged in a social media post to stop institutional investors from buying more homes. Norah Mulinda breaks down how markets reacted and what may come next. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Trump pledged in a social media post to stop institutional investors from buying more homes. Norah Mulinda breaks down how markets reacted and what may come next. (Source: Bloomberg)
